name: .CDMM File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDMM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CDMM file is a document created by ConceptDraw MINDMAP, a visual mind-mapping application. It contains a diagram with objects, connecting lines, symbols, and appearance settings. CS Odessa replaced CDMM files with .CDMZ files for saving mind-mapping documents.

content: ConceptDraw MINDMAP is a mind-mapping tool for helping amateurs and professionals organize and visualize ideas and plans. Before being replaced, the CDMM file type was the default format for saving mind maps in previous versions of ConceptDraw MINDMAP. Now, ConceptDraw MINDMAP saves mind maps as CDMZ files by default, but still supports the CDMM format.

instructions: You can open CDMM files with CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP in Windows and macOS. To open a CDMM file, select File â†’ Open.
